about.greeting: Greetings! I'm Hunor Nagy, an aspiring web developer with a passion for crafting digital experiences. While I may not boast a lengthy professional background, my enthusiasm for learning and dedication to mastering the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) stack have been the driving forces behind my journey.
about.approach: My approach to web development is a fusion of creativity and technical proficiency. Through self-directed learning and hands-on projects, I've cultivated skills in building robust backend solutions with Node.js and Express.js, as well as creating engaging user interfaces with React.js.
about.commitment: Every project in my portfolio is a testament to my commitment to mastering the art of web development. I am excited about the endless possibilities this field offers and am eager to contribute my skills to innovative and collaborative projects.

cook_book: Welcome to Cook-Cook, the ultimate cookbook web app! Discover, share, and savor delicious recipes from around the world. Whether you're a seasoned chef or a home cook, Cook-Cook connects you with a community of food enthusiasts eager to inspire your next culinary adventure.
